alert.note: Alert for Olmsted; Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:54PM CDT until July 22 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL OLMSTED AND SOUTHWESTERN WABASHA COUNTIES... At 554 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oronoco, or 8 miles north of Rochester, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Elgin around 615 PM CDT. Eyota around 630 PM CDT. Dover around 640 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include South Troy, Ringe, County Roads 9 And 10, County Roads 79 And 2, Rattelsnake Point, Potsdam and County Roads 137 And 136. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 220 and 232. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
